TELEVISION MONITORING STUDIES
9.
Publ.
No.
M-l New York Television (Studies #1 and #4) - Dallas W. Smythe
A comprehansive study of the programs carried by the New York City
television stations during the period January 4-10, 1951 and
January 4-10, 1952. 108 pp. Paper. $3,00 (Special price to
NAEB members - $1.00)
M-2 Los Angeles Television (Study #2) - Dallas W. Smythe and Angus Campbell
A comprehenseive study of the programs carried by the Los Angeles
television stations during the period May 23-29, 1951* 9^ PP-
Paper. $3.00 (Special price to NAEB members - $1,00)
M-3 Chicago Summer Television (Study #3) - Hans 0. Mauksch, Donald Horton, and
Kurt Lang
A comprehensive study of the programs carried by the Chicago teleÂ¬
vision stations on August 5> 1951* 73 PP- Paper $3-00 (Special
price to NAEB members - $1.00)
M-4 New Haven Television (Study #5) - Dallas W. Smythe
A comprehensive study of the programs carried by the New Haven
television station during the period May 15-21, 1952. 119 PP-
Paper. $3.00 (Special price to NAEB members - $1.00)
M-5 Three Years of New York Television (Study 7f6) - Dallas W. Smythe
A comprehensive study of theprograms carried by the New York
City television stations during the period January 4-10, 1953-
and compared with January 4-10, 1951 and 1952. l6l pp. Paper
$3.00 (Special price to NAEB members - $1.00)
M-6 Four Years of New York Television (Study #7) - H. H. Hemmers (Purdue
Opinion Panel)
A comprehensive study of the programs carried by the New York
City television stations during the period January 25-31, 1954 and
compared with the three previous years. 92 pp. Paper. $3.00
(Special price to NAEB members - $1.00)
R-2 See also Some Comparisons Between British and American Television (Research
Project #2) - John T. Suchy
Excerpts from a thesis presented in partial fulfillment of the
requirements for the M.A. Degree in Journalism at the State
University of Iowa. October, 1954. 22 pp. Paper. 500
M-10 Complete set of all Monitoring Studies listed above, $15.00 (special
price to NAEB members - $5.00).
